price: Sε Yεpε a, anka yεbεma wͻn ani afira na wͻakeka apε kwan no, na sεn na anka wͻbɛsi ahunu (kwan)?
arabic: وَلَوۡ نَشَآءُ لَطَمَسۡنَا عَلَىٰٓ أَعۡيُنِهِمۡ فَٱسۡتَبَقُواْ ٱلصِّرَٰطَ فَأَنَّىٰ يُبۡصِرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walaw nashāu laṭamasnā ʿalā aʿyunihim fa-is'tabaqū al-ṣirāṭa fa-annā yub'ṣirūna
